Method Detail

getFormat

public obviousx.text.TypedFormat getFormat(java.lang.String type)
Gives the associated TypedFormat object associated to a type entered as a String. This method in this implementation recognizes classic java types : String, boolean, numbers and date. This method is made to be overriden.

Specified by:
getFormat in interface obviousx.util.FormatFactory
Parameters:
type - The type as a String.
Returns:
a TypedFormat object

getSQLType

public java.lang.String getSQLType(java.lang.Class<?> c)
Gives the corresponding SQL format for a Java class. This method should and could be overridden for particular JDBC / Obvious implementations.

Parameters:
c - Java class to "convert" in a SQL type
Returns:
a corresponding SQL type in String format

getFormat

public obviousx.text.TypedFormat getFormat(java.text.Format format)
Specified by:
getFormat in interface obviousx.util.FormatFactory
